Texto: 
ap radiograph and proton density fat saturation (pd fs) knee mr from 2002 showing calcific deposits within the lateral collateral ligament (lcl). more recent imaging from 2005 showed resolution of calcium deposits.
hydroxyapatite deposition disease
hydroxyapatite deposition disease
calcium pyrophosphate deposition disease
65 y/o with longstanding right knee pain
